page.title: 03LEISURE FACILITIES IN L'BORO
page.content: The Nanpantan Sports Ground provides excellent facilities for tennis, cricket, football and bowling. The land is also used by dog walkers and model aeroplane enthusiasts, the land is owned by Charnwood Council. Longclifee Golf Course is an eighteen hole course. There are currently 55O members and a professional coach. Membership is by annual payment. There are facilities for fishing at Nanpantan Reservoir. Fishing is by permit which costs Â£1 a day or Â£20 a season. The reservoir is stocked with several thousand fish from Severn Trent Water Authority stock, including roach, perch, carp and crayfish. Mostly local people use the reservoir. The Quorn Hunt ride over our block on their Boxing Day Hunt. Anyone may participate in this.
